description:
What’s the one question you’d love to have the answer to in order to take the next step in your life ?
Maybe you don’t know how to create or launch a product, leave a job, talk to your boss, deal with the stress, find a mentor, or choose the right task management tool. Whatever it is, anything is fair game.
When We Surround Ourselves with Passionate, Inspiring & Inspired People, Everything Becomes Possible...
Let’s support each other in making real progress toward finding and doing work we love and making a difference in the world. And have fun!

Join us in our Facebook :

https://www.facebook.com/events/1478726242339135/?ref_dashboard_filter=upcoming
name: Take the next step in your life !

description:
Come with your project (or draft idea) of what you want to build in life?

We will give you free eye-opening feed-back to see life opportunities differently.

And if you have a person that inspires you, bring her/him along and tell us why.

Looking forward to meeting you Legends !

Feel free to join our FB group: https://www.facebook.com/events/678801998846796/

#LiveYourLegendLocal
how_to_find_us: We try to meet at the lobby-bar; where the tall table is.
name: Take the next step in your life !
